import java.util.Scanner;


 class String_Code {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		int test=s.nextInt();
		while(test>0)
		{
			String s1=s.next();
			/*System.out.println(s1.length());*/
			int size=s1.length();
			String s2=s1.substring(0,(size/2));
			String s3=s1.substring((size/2));
			String r1=new StringBuilder(s2).reverse().toString();
			String r2=new StringBuilder(s3).reverse().toString();
			String finalString=r1+r2;
			System.out.println(finalString);
			test--;
		}

	}

}
